thread.title: Velo Vino combines tastes of Italian wine, cycling and food

author: Carey Sweet
title: Velo Vino combines tastes of Italian wine, cycling and food
text:
Photo: Sarah Rice, Special To The Chronicle Bicycles decorate the Velo Vino tasting room, above; outside, executive chef John McConnell offers a cured bruschetta plate from the Clif Family Bruschetteria food truck, left. Bicycles decorate the Velo Vino tasting room, above; outside,...
I’m studying the bicycling map for the adventures offered at Velo Vino tasting room in St. Helena, and I can cross one option off right away. Bicycles decorate the Velo Vino tasting room, above; outside, executive chef John McConnell offers a cured bruschetta plate from the Clif Family Bruschetteria food truck, left. Bicycles decorate the Velo Vino tasting room, above; outside,...
I’m studying the bicycling map for the adventures offered at Velo Vino tasting room in St. Helena, and I can cross one option off right away.
